00017         CEventServer::CEventServer(boost::mutex& lock, boost::condition_variable& evnt)
00018                 : m_active(false)
00019                 , m_refFwkLock(lock)
00020                 , m_refFwkEvent(evnt)
00021         { }

00026         { }

00030         void CEventServer::SendEvent(CEventListenerQueue listeners, IEventDispatcher* dispatcher)
00031         {
00032                 THREAD_ANY();
00033 
00034                 if(!m_active) return;
00035 
00036                 DoSendEvent(listeners, dispatcher);
00037         }
00038 
00040 
00041         void CEventServer::PostEvent(const CEventListenerQueue &listeners, IEventDispatcher *dispatcher)
00042         {
00043                 THREAD_ANY();
00044 
00045                 if(!m_active)
00046                 {
00047                         delete dispatcher;
00048                         return;
00049                 }
00050 
00051                 {
00052                         scoped_lock l(m_refFwkLock);
00053                         m_queue.push(std::make_pair<CEventListenerQueue, IEventDispatcher*>(listeners, dispatcher));
00054                 }
00055                 m_refFwkEvent.notify_one();
00056         }
00057 
00059 
00060         void CEventServer::DeliverEvents()
00061         {
00062                 THREAD_FRAMEWORK();
00063                 VERBOSE("[EventServer] Delivering events...");
00064 
00065                 CEventListenerQueue* listeners;
00066                 IEventDispatcher* dispatcher;
00067 
00068                 while(true)
00069                 {
00070                         {
00071                                 scoped_lock l(m_refFwkLock);
00072 
00073                                 if(m_queue.empty()) break;
00074 
00075                                 listeners = &m_queue.front().first;
00076                                 dispatcher = m_queue.front().second;
00077                         }
00078 
00079                         if(m_active)
00080                                 DoSendEvent(*listeners, dispatcher);
00081 
00082                         {
00083                                 scoped_lock l(m_refFwkLock);
00084 
00085                                 delete dispatcher;
00086                                 m_queue.pop();
00087                         }
00088                 }
00089         }
00090 
00092 
00093         bool CEventServer::HasPendingEvents() const
00094         {
00095                 THREAD_FRAMEWORK();
00096                 return !m_queue.empty();
00097         }
00098 
00100 
00101         void CEventServer::DoSendEvent(const CEventListenerQueue &listeners, IEventDispatcher *dispatcher)
00102         {
00103                 IUnknown** lst = listeners.getListeners();
00104 
00105                 for(size_t i = 0, size = listeners.Size(); i != size; ++i)
00106                         dispatcher->Dispatch(lst[i]);
00107         }
